text: Bound for Glory is a 1976 American biographical drama movie directed by Hal Ashby and based on the 1943 autobiography by Woody Guthrie. It stars David Carradine, Ronny Cox, Melinda Dillon, Gail Strickland, Randy Quaid, Ji-Tu Cumbuka and was distributed by United Artists. It was nominated for 6 Oscars and won 2 Academy Awards in 1977. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1976 drama movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Hal Ashby Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American road movies Category:1970s road movies Category:Movies about singers Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies about composers Category:Movies based on biographies Category:Academy Award winning movies
title: Bound for Glory (1976 movie)
